channel.title: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Protect your API endpoints: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/protect-your-api/aspnetcore3/main/ Why is this here?: A majority of oktane customers placed “API Service Integration” under “Authentication for service apps” Structure type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
